thread.title: The best travel gadget ever is now available in Europe
thread.title_full: The best travel gadget ever is now available in Europe

author: Matthew Hughes
title: The best travel gadget ever is now available in Europe
text:
43 shares 
I love to travel. But I’m not keen on how hard it can be to stay connected while abroad. 
Roaming is still excruciatingly expensive. Even if your provider offers free roaming, it’s usually capped to near-2G speeds. And while hunting down free Wi-Fi hotspots is pretty tiresome, it doesn’t come close to how irritating it is to stand in line for a local SIM card.
